greeter

Class Greeter

  • java.lang.Object
    • greeter.Greeter

  • public class Greeter
extends java.lang.Object
    A class for producing simple greetings.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Greeter(java.lang.String aName)
      Constructs a Greeter object that can greet a person or entity.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String sayHello()
      Greet with a "Hello" message.
      void setName(java.lang.String newName)
      Sets the name field of a Greeter object.
      void swapNames(Greeter other)
      Swaps two names between two Greeter objects.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Greeter

        public Greeter(java.lang.String aName)
        Constructs a Greeter object that can greet a person or entity.
        Parameters:
        aName - the name of the person or entity who should be addressed in the greetings.

    • Method Detail

      • sayHello

        public java.lang.String sayHello()
        Greet with a "Hello" message.
        Returns:
        a message containing "Hello" and the name of the greeted person or entity.

      • setName

        public void setName(java.lang.String newName)
        Sets the name field of a Greeter object.
        Parameters:
        newName - the name of the person or entity who should be addressed in the greetings.

      • swapNames

        public void swapNames(Greeter other)
        Swaps two names between two Greeter objects.
        Parameters:
        other - a Greeter whose name will be swapped with the name of the object that calls this method.
